publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-631# Nicola Sturgeon: Closure of Post Offices in Glasgow-That the Parliament condemns Royal Mail for its decision to donate £1 million to London's bid for the 2012 Olympic Games at the same time as it is proposing to close 20 local post offices in Glasgow, in addition to the 11 already closed since January 2003, and believes that the watchdog body, Postwatch Scotland, should investigate as a matter of urgency whether this decision represents value for money for Royal Mail's customers in Glasgow. Supported by: Shona Robison*, Ms Sandra White*

S2M-631# Closure of Post Offices in Glasgow (lodged on 19 November 2003) Michael Matheson*, Stewart Stevenson*, Patrick Harvie*, Fergus Ewing*, Mike Pringle*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Carolyn Leckie*, Eleanor Scott*
